column1: #Text=The 15% tax on 'non-residents' is the most blatant and offensive racist attack I have witnessed in recent memory.
#Text=I am shocked that so few Canadians see it as such.
#Text=What will it take to wake people up to the xenophobic nature of this tax?
#Text=We should be welcoming wealthy immigrants to our country for many reasons, not the least of which is their potential to contribute to legitimate economic growth.
